verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:32
verses.text: And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:33
verses.text: Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:34
verses.text: And of Naphtali a thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty and seven thousand.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:35
verses.text: And of the Danites expert in war twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.
